title: Blightbringer
content:
leric - the goblin shaman Kirruk Redrats created this deadly bow. Shortbow 18m Two-Handed 0.9 480

Blightbringer: Attacking gnomes or dwarves with this weapon receives a +1d4 bonus to Attack and Damage rolls.

Prey Decelerator: When this weapon lands a Critical Hit, it also Slows the target creature.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Conducting a series of increasingly sick rituals - involving the ashes of a gnome and silk wormts fed fat on the corpse of a dwarv
